user.title: Configure Haptique RS90
user.description:
Remote detected: {remote_id}

Give your remote a name (optional).

error.mqtt_not_configured: MQTT is not configured. Please configure MQTT before adding this integration.
error.no_remote_found: No Haptique RS90 remote found. Make sure it is connected and publishing to MQTT.

trigger_macro.name: Trigger macro
trigger_macro.description: Triggers a specific macro on the Haptique RS90 remote.

device_id.name: RS90 Remote
device_id.description: Select your Haptique RS90 remote (find it in Settings > Devices & Services > Haptique RS90)

macro_name.name: Macro name (DEPRECATED)
macro_name.description: DEPRECATED - Will be removed in future release of the integration. This parameter breaks when you rename the macro in Haptique Config! Use macro_id instead. The exact name of the macro to trigger (case-sensitive).

macro_id.name: Macro ID (RECOMMENDED)
macro_id.description: RECOMMENDED - The stable ID of the macro (from switch attributes). This ID never changes even if you rename the macro in Haptique Config.

trigger_device_command.name: Trigger device command
trigger_device_command.description: Sends a specific command to a device via the RS90 remote.

device_id.name: RS90 Remote
device_id.description: Select your Haptique RS90 remote (find it in Settings > Devices & Services > Haptique RS90)

device_name.name: Device name (DEPRECATED)
device_name.description: DEPRECATED - Will be removed in future release of the integration. This parameter breaks when you rename the device in Haptique Config! Use haptique_device_id instead. The exact name of the device configured in RS90 (case-sensitive).

haptique_device_id.name: Haptique Device ID (RECOMMENDED)
haptique_device_id.description: RECOMMENDED - The stable ID of the device (from sensor attributes). This ID never changes even if you rename the device in Haptique Config. Find it in sensor attributes: haptique_device_id

command_name.name: Command name
command_name.description: The exact command name to send (check the device commands sensor to see available commands)

refresh_lists.name: Refresh lists
refresh_lists.description: Force refresh of device and macro lists from the RS90 remote. Use this if devices or macros don't appear after adding them in Haptique Config.
